CustomField.formula: if(isblank(SmartViscaf__image_id__c) || isblank(SmartViscaf__width__c) || isblank(SmartViscaf__height__c) , null , hyperlink( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" & SmartViscaf__image_id__c , image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" & SmartViscaf__image_id__c , "サムネイル" , SmartViscaf__height__c / 4 , SmartViscaf__width__c / 4) , "_blank" ) )
CustomField.label: サムネイル
